steps.title: What’s new in Educ8 RemUI!
steps.content: Hey Moodler! Get ready for more granular control on how your Moodle looks and performs. Now you can easily edit and customize your Moodle interface on the go, in real-time with the Live Customizer in Educ8 RemUI. Our intuitive Live Customizer enables you to see the changes as you make them. And help you see exactly how your Moodle site will look like right then and there! So, go ahead and click on the brush shaped customizer icon in the left sidebar to see how it works!
